trans-unit.source: Defines the base class for peer channel message filters.
trans-unit.target: 定义对等通道消息筛选器的基类。

trans-unit.source: Implementations of filters for messages transmitted over a peer channel must be derived from this class.
trans-unit.target: 通过对等通道传输的消息筛选器的实现必须派生自此类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerMessagePropagationFilter"></xref> class.
Returns whether or not a message received on a peer channel should be propagated, and if so, the destination of the message.
trans-unit.target: 返回是否应传播对等通道上接收一条消息，以及如果是这样，消息的目标。

trans-unit.source: The message to evaluate for propagation.
trans-unit.target: 要计算用于传播的消息。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerMessageOrigination"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the origin (local or remote) of the message under evaluation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerMessageOrigination"> </xref>枚举值，指定在评估消息的源 （本地或远程）。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerMessagePropagation"></xref> enumeration value that indicates the destination of the message (local, remote, both, or no propagation at all).
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerMessagePropagation"> </xref>枚举值，该值指示消息的目标 (本地、 远程、 两者或无根本传播)。
